changed_products.title: Belt Barrier 20 Pack Custom Printed Belts - QueueMaster Retractable Belt Barriers - 3.4m Belt

description: Product OverviewThis 20-pack of QueueMaster custom-printed belt barriers offers a professional, cost-effective solution for managing queues while promoting your brand.Key Features:✅ Custom Branding – Your logo or design is digitally printed on the belt for a personalized touch.✅ High-Quality Construction – Durable materials ensure long-lasting performance.✅ Multiple Finishes – Available in black, polished stainless, and satin stainless to match any environment.✅ Optimal Belt Design – Features a 5cm-wide, 3.4m belt with a slow-retracting brake system for smooth operation.✅ Secure & Safe – Includes a locking belt end to prevent accidental release.✅ Floor Protection – A full-circumference floor protector helps prevent damage to flooring.✅ Free Shipping Bundle – Enjoy cost savings with free delivery included.Need a different belt length? Get in touch, and we’ll customise it for you!

Printed Retractable Belt Barriers – 20 Pack Product Overview

The EconomyPrinted Retractable Belt Barriers bundle provides a professional and highly visible solution for queue management and access control. This 20-pack Custom Printed Retractable Belt Barriers set includes our economy stanchions fitted with custom-printed belts, allowing you to display branding, instructions, or safety messaging clearly. As a result, you improve organisation while reinforcing brand presence in busy environments.

Professional Queue Control with Custom Branding

Through a process called dye sublimation each belt features high-quality digital printing, which ensures logos and messages remain sharp and long-lasting. Moreover, the retractable belt design supports fast layout changes without tools. The 5cm wide, 3.4m belt offers excellent span coverage, while the slow-retract brake system improves safety during use. Consequently, these barriers suit high-traffic locations that demand both control and visual impact.

Heavy-Duty Construction for Demanding Environments

This Printed Retractable Belt Barriers Set uses steel posts and a heavy base with protective cover. Therefore, each unit remains stable during constant daily use. Additionally, the full-circumference floor protector helps prevent scuffs and marks on finished flooring. Premium finish options include black, polished stainless steel, and satin stainless steel, allowing easy coordination with your space.

Printed Retractable Belt Barriers are Ideal for Events, Retail and Public Venues

This barrier set works well in retail stores, airports, exhibitions, hospitality venues and corporate spaces. Furthermore, the belt locking mechanism prevents accidental release, which improves safety and reliability. If you require a different belt length or message, customisation options are available on request. Consequently, this bundle delivers flexibility without compromising durability.

  • ☑ Custom printed retractable belts
  • ☑ 20-pack bundle for large areas
  • ☑ 3.4m slow-retract safety belt
  • ☑ Floor-protecting rubber base ring
  • ☑ Black, polished or satin stainless finishes

View our full range of retractable belt barriers here.
For best-practice crowd guidance, visit the HSE advice here.

changed_products.title: Belt Barrier 10 Pack - Black Post Retractable Belt Barriers - 2.6m/3.4m/3.9 metres - Over 40 Stock Belt Colour Options and Lettering

description:
Product Overview: 10 Pack Belt Barriers

10 pack belt barriers from QueueMaster give you a cost-effective, professional queue system. You cut post counts, speed setup, and improve customer flow in busy areas.

Longer Belts, Lower Costs

Each post includes a choice of 2.6m through to 3.9m retractable belt options, so you span more distance with fewer units. That reduces purchase costs and installation time while keeping lines tidy.

Key Features of Queue Barriers

A slow-retract brake helps prevent snap-back. The locking belt end keeps the tape secure during use. A full-circumference rubber floor protector shields surfaces from scratches and moisture.

Fast Setup and Daily Handling

Each steel post weighs around 9 kg. Staff can move and position units quickly. The concrete-filled, galvanised base delivers reliable stability in high-traffic zones.

Flexible Layouts for Belt Barrier Posts

Four-way connectivity supports straight runs, zig-zags, and compact holding pens. Adjust lanes as traffic changes through the day.

Branding and Belt Options

Choose from 50 stock belt colours and safety messages. Custom printing lets you add logos or wayfinding so the system matches your brand.

What’s Included

Ten retractable belt posts with 2.6m through to 3.9m belt options and heavy-duty bases. Add sign frames or wall receivers to complete the setup.

Ideal Locations

Airports, arenas, transport hubs, museums, and retail stores benefit from these retractable belt barriers. The robust build suits indoor use and covered outdoor areas.

Plan Your Queue System

Pair posts with sign frames and accessories for clear guidance. Browse all belt barriers to finish your layout.

For official guidance on safe queuing, see the UK HSE’s event safety advice at hse.gov.uk/event-safety/.

These 10 pack belt barriers deliver reach, safety, and value in one proven solution. Control foot traffic with fewer posts and a cleaner line design.

– 10 Pack Belt Barriers10 Pack Belt Barriers from QueueMaster provide a cost-effective and professional queue management solution. From the outset, this multi-post set helps reduce unit costs while improving customer flow. Moreover, the system allows faster setup in busy environments where clear guidance matters.Longer Belt Spans for Efficient QueuesEach post includes a choice of 2.6m to 3.9m retractable belts. As a result, you cover more distance using fewer posts. Consequently, installation time drops while queue lines remain neat and controlled throughout the day.Key Features of These 10 Pack Belt BarriersA slow-retract brake system helps prevent snap-back and improves safety. Meanwhile, the locking belt end keeps the tape secure during use. In addition, a full-circumference rubber floor protector shields surfaces from scratches and moisture. The tough ABS cassette also resists knocks in high-traffic areas.Fast Setup and Daily HandlingEach steel post weighs around 9kg, so staff can reposition units quickly. At the same time, the concrete-filled galvanised base delivers reliable stability where queues change frequently.Flexible Layouts for Queue ControlFour-way connectivity supports straight runs, zig-zag layouts and compact holding pens. Therefore, you can adjust layouts easily as foot traffic increases or decreases.Branding and Belt OptionsChoose from over 50 stock belt colours and safety messages. Additionally, custom printing allows logos or wayfinding to match your brand identity.What’s Included in the 10 Pack Belt BarriersThis set includes ten retractable belt barrier posts with 2.6m to 3.9m belt options and heavy-duty bases. You can also add sign frames or wall receivers to complete the system.Ideal Locations for Retractable Belt BarriersAirports, arenas, museums, transport hubs and retail stores benefit from this solution. Furthermore, the robust build suits indoor use and covered outdoor areas.Plan Your Queue LayoutTo improve guidance further, pair posts with sign frames.You can also browse the full range of belt barriers to expand your layout.For official guidance on safe queuing, see the UK HSE advice at hse.gov.uk/event-safety.Overall, this 10-post queue system delivers safety, flexibility and value. Therefore, it remains a reliable choice for managing foot traffic efficiently.

changed_products.title: Value Series Black Wall Mount 4.6m Black Retractable Belt Barrier With Receiver

description: Product OverviewBEST VALUE WALL MOUNT RETRACTABLE BELT BARRIERSOur Value wall mounted belt barrier helps cordon off restricted areas and allow temporary access to areas in retail environments & commercial locations. Our Wall mounted crowd control barriers feature an easy retracting 4.6m long belt with safety brakes for slow and safe belt retraction. Our universal belt ends are compatible with most major brands and specifically designed to work with all crowd control company products. Includes a locking belt receiver to prevent accidental tape release. Our industrial Wall mount housing and bracket are made from heavy duty ABS plastic for long term strength and durability.

Wall Mounted Crowd Barrier – Product Overview

The Wall Mounted Crowd Barrier provides a practical and space-saving solution for controlling access in busy environments. It helps cordon off restricted areas while keeping floors clear and walkways unobstructed. As a result, it suits retail spaces, commercial buildings, and public venues that need flexible crowd control. Moreover, the wall-mounted design allows fast deployment without using floor posts or bases.

Designed for Safe and Reliable Crowd Control

This wall mounted belt barrier features a smooth retracting belt with an integrated safety brake. Therefore, the belt retracts slowly and safely during use. In addition, the locking belt receiver prevents accidental release, which improves safety in high-traffic areas. The 4.6m belt length offers strong coverage for doorways, corridors, and access points. Consequently, fewer barriers are needed to secure wider openings.

Wall Mounted Crowd Barrier has a Durable Construction for Everyday Use

The housing and mounting bracket use heavy-duty ABS plastic for long-term durability. As a result, the unit withstands frequent daily use in commercial environments. Furthermore, the universal belt end works with most major brands. It also integrates seamlessly with other Crowd Control Company products. This compatibility makes upgrades and expansions simple and cost-effective.

Flexible Installation and Applications

You can install this barrier quickly using the supplied wall bracket and receiver. Therefore, it works well for temporary or semi-permanent layouts. Typical applications include shop entrances, staff-only areas, corridors, and waiting zones. Additionally, the wall-mounted format keeps emergency exits and walkways clear, which supports better site safety and compliance.

Key Features
  • ☑ Wall mounted crowd barrier for space-saving access control
  • ☑ 4.6m retractable belt for wide openings
  • ☑ Slow-retract safety brake for controlled belt return
  • ☑ Locking belt receiver to prevent accidental release
  • ☑ Heavy-duty ABS housing for long-term durability
  • ☑ Universal belt end compatible with major brands

See the full range of wall mounted safety barriershere.
For official guidance on managing crowds safely, visit theHSE website.

description_changes.title: Belt Barrier 10 Pack - Black Post Retractable Belt Barriers - 2.6m/3.4m/3.9 metres - Over 40 Stock Belt Colour Options and Lettering

description:
Product Overview: 10 Pack Belt Barriers

10 pack belt barriers from QueueMaster give you a cost-effective, professional queue system. You cut post counts, speed setup, and improve customer flow in busy areas.

Longer Belts, Lower Costs

Each post includes a choice of 2.6m through to 3.9m retractable belt options, so you span more distance with fewer units. That reduces purchase costs and installation time while keeping lines tidy.

Key Features of Queue Barriers

A slow-retract brake helps prevent snap-back. The locking belt end keeps the tape secure during use. A full-circumference rubber floor protector shields surfaces from scratches and moisture.

Fast Setup and Daily Handling

Each steel post weighs around 9 kg. Staff can move and position units quickly. The concrete-filled, galvanised base delivers reliable stability in high-traffic zones.

Flexible Layouts for Belt Barrier Posts

Four-way connectivity supports straight runs, zig-zags, and compact holding pens. Adjust lanes as traffic changes through the day.

Branding and Belt Options

Choose from 50 stock belt colours and safety messages. Custom printing lets you add logos or wayfinding so the system matches your brand.

What’s Included

Ten retractable belt posts with 2.6m through to 3.9m belt options and heavy-duty bases. Add sign frames or wall receivers to complete the setup.

Ideal Locations

Airports, arenas, transport hubs, museums, and retail stores benefit from these retractable belt barriers. The robust build suits indoor use and covered outdoor areas.

Plan Your Queue System

Pair posts with sign frames and accessories for clear guidance. Browse all belt barriers to finish your layout.

For official guidance on safe queuing, see the UK HSE’s event safety advice at hse.gov.uk/event-safety/.

These 10 pack belt barriers deliver reach, safety, and value in one proven solution. Control foot traffic with fewer posts and a cleaner line design.

– 10 Pack Belt Barriers10 Pack Belt Barriers from QueueMaster provide a cost-effective and professional queue management solution. From the outset, this multi-post set helps reduce unit costs while improving customer flow. Moreover, the system allows faster setup in busy environments where clear guidance matters.Longer Belt Spans for Efficient QueuesEach post includes a choice of 2.6m to 3.9m retractable belts. As a result, you cover more distance using fewer posts. Consequently, installation time drops while queue lines remain neat and controlled throughout the day.Key Features of These 10 Pack Belt BarriersA slow-retract brake system helps prevent snap-back and improves safety. Meanwhile, the locking belt end keeps the tape secure during use. In addition, a full-circumference rubber floor protector shields surfaces from scratches and moisture. The tough ABS cassette also resists knocks in high-traffic areas.Fast Setup and Daily HandlingEach steel post weighs around 9kg, so staff can reposition units quickly. At the same time, the concrete-filled galvanised base delivers reliable stability where queues change frequently.Flexible Layouts for Queue ControlFour-way connectivity supports straight runs, zig-zag layouts and compact holding pens. Therefore, you can adjust layouts easily as foot traffic increases or decreases.Branding and Belt OptionsChoose from over 50 stock belt colours and safety messages. Additionally, custom printing allows logos or wayfinding to match your brand identity.What’s Included in the 10 Pack Belt BarriersThis set includes ten retractable belt barrier posts with 2.6m to 3.9m belt options and heavy-duty bases. You can also add sign frames or wall receivers to complete the system.Ideal Locations for Retractable Belt BarriersAirports, arenas, museums, transport hubs and retail stores benefit from this solution. Furthermore, the robust build suits indoor use and covered outdoor areas.Plan Your Queue LayoutTo improve guidance further, pair posts with sign frames.You can also browse the full range of belt barriers to expand your layout.For official guidance on safe queuing, see the UK HSE advice at hse.gov.uk/event-safety.Overall, this 10-post queue system delivers safety, flexibility and value. Therefore, it remains a reliable choice for managing foot traffic efficiently.

description_changes.title: Value Series Black Wall Mount 4.6m Black Retractable Belt Barrier With Receiver

description: Product OverviewBEST VALUE WALL MOUNT RETRACTABLE BELT BARRIERSOur Value wall mounted belt barrier helps cordon off restricted areas and allow temporary access to areas in retail environments & commercial locations. Our Wall mounted crowd control barriers feature an easy retracting 4.6m long belt with safety brakes for slow and safe belt retraction. Our universal belt ends are compatible with most major brands and specifically designed to work with all crowd control company products. Includes a locking belt receiver to prevent accidental tape release. Our industrial Wall mount housing and bracket are made from heavy duty ABS plastic for long term strength and durability.

Wall Mounted Crowd Barrier – Product Overview

The Wall Mounted Crowd Barrier provides a practical and space-saving solution for controlling access in busy environments. It helps cordon off restricted areas while keeping floors clear and walkways unobstructed. As a result, it suits retail spaces, commercial buildings, and public venues that need flexible crowd control. Moreover, the wall-mounted design allows fast deployment without using floor posts or bases.

Designed for Safe and Reliable Crowd Control

This wall mounted belt barrier features a smooth retracting belt with an integrated safety brake. Therefore, the belt retracts slowly and safely during use. In addition, the locking belt receiver prevents accidental release, which improves safety in high-traffic areas. The 4.6m belt length offers strong coverage for doorways, corridors, and access points. Consequently, fewer barriers are needed to secure wider openings.

Wall Mounted Crowd Barrier has a Durable Construction for Everyday Use

The housing and mounting bracket use heavy-duty ABS plastic for long-term durability. As a result, the unit withstands frequent daily use in commercial environments. Furthermore, the universal belt end works with most major brands. It also integrates seamlessly with other Crowd Control Company products. This compatibility makes upgrades and expansions simple and cost-effective.

Flexible Installation and Applications

You can install this barrier quickly using the supplied wall bracket and receiver. Therefore, it works well for temporary or semi-permanent layouts. Typical applications include shop entrances, staff-only areas, corridors, and waiting zones. Additionally, the wall-mounted format keeps emergency exits and walkways clear, which supports better site safety and compliance.

Key Features
  • ☑ Wall mounted crowd barrier for space-saving access control
  • ☑ 4.6m retractable belt for wide openings
  • ☑ Slow-retract safety brake for controlled belt return
  • ☑ Locking belt receiver to prevent accidental release
  • ☑ Heavy-duty ABS housing for long-term durability
  • ☑ Universal belt end compatible with major brands

See the full range of wall mounted safety barriershere.
For official guidance on managing crowds safely, visit theHSE website.

description_changes.title: Belt Barrier 20 Pack Custom Printed Belt - QueuePro 300 Retractable Belt Barriers - 4.9m Belt

description: Product OverviewQueuePro Premium Custom Belt Barriers – 20 PackEnhance queue management with high-quality, custom-printed belt barriers featuring your branding. This free-shipping bundle includes 10 premium stanchions, built for durability and high-traffic use.✅ Custom Branding – Digitally printed belts showcase your logo or messaging.✅ Premium Finishes – Available in black, polished stainless, or satin stainless.✅ Heavy-Duty Construction – Built with steel posts and a solid cast iron low-profile base for stability.✅ High-Performance Belt – 5cm wide, 4.9m retractable belt with slow-retracting brake system.✅ Safety Features – Belt lock prevents accidental release for secure crowd control.✅ Floor Protection – Full circumference floor protector prevents scuffs and damage.Need a different belt length? Get in touch for customisation options!

Branded Retractable Belt Barriers – 20 Pack Product Overview

The Branded Retractable Belt Barriers bundle provides a professional and highly visible solution for queue management and access control. This 20-pack set includes premium stanchions fitted with custom-printed belts, allowing you to display branding, instructions, or safety messaging clearly. As a result, you improve organisation while reinforcing brand presence in busy environments.

Professional Queue Control with Custom Branding

Through a process called dye sublimation each belt features high-quality digital printing, which ensures logos and messages remain sharp and long-lasting. Moreover, the retractable belt design supports fast layout changes without tools. The 5cm wide, 4.9m belt offers excellent span coverage, while the slow-retract brake system improves safety during use. Consequently, these barriers suit high-traffic locations that demand both control and visual impact.

Heavy-Duty Construction for Demanding Environments

These branded retractable belt barriers use steel posts combined with a solid cast-iron low-profile base. Therefore, each unit remains stable during constant daily use. Additionally, the full-circumference floor protector helps prevent scuffs and marks on finished flooring. Premium finish options include black, polished stainless steel, and satin stainless steel, allowing easy coordination with your space.

Branded Retractable Belt Barriers are Ideal for Events, Retail and Public Venues

This barrier set works well in retail stores, airports, exhibitions, hospitality venues and corporate spaces. Furthermore, the belt locking mechanism prevents accidental release, which improves safety and reliability. If you require a different belt length or message, customisation options are available on request. Consequently, this bundle delivers flexibility without compromising durability.

  • ☑ Custom printed retractable belts
  • ☑ 20-pack bundle for large areas
  • ☑ 4.9m slow-retract safety belt
  • ☑ Heavy cast-iron base for stability
  • ☑ Floor-protecting rubber base ring
  • ☑ Black, polished or satin stainless finishes

View our full range of retractable belt barriers here.
For best-practice crowd guidance, visit the HSE advice here.
